attributes.action: review the film certificate given to: Sweeney Todd
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The film has been given the rating of an 18 by the BBFC, where many people think that this rating should be lowered to a 15 rating. Even the director Tim Burton disagrees with the rating and states that he has created a musical! Alos how come the BBC's production did not recieve such a rating?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
